eventDecorators.name: BlockProduced
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when first initializing the Miso Farm Factory.

functionDecorators.name: canProduceBlock
functionDecorators.description: Check if address is allowed to produce block.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the instance of block selector you want to interact with.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: the address that is gonna get checked.

parameterDecorators.name: _weight
parameterDecorators.description: number that will weight the random number, most likely will be the number of staked tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the instance of block selector to be interact with.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the instance of block selector to be interact with.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the instance of block selector to be interact with.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the instance of block selector to be interact with.

returnDecorators.description: timestamp of when last block was created.

functionDecorators.name: getMicrosecondsSinceLastBlock
functionDecorators.description: Returns time since last selection started, in microseconds.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the instance of block selector to be interact with.

returnDecorators.description: microseconds passed since last selection started.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the instance of block selector to be interact with.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the instance of block selector to be interact with.

parameterDecorators.name: _difficultyAdjustmentParameter
parameterDecorators.description: how quickly the difficulty gets updated according to the difference between time passed and target interval.

parameterDecorators.name: _targetInterval
parameterDecorators.description: how often we want produce blocks.

parameterDecorators.name: _posManagerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: address of ProofOfStake that will use this instance.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the instance of block selector you want to interact with.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: address that has the right to produce block.

parameterDecorators.name: _weight
parameterDecorators.description: number that will weight the random number, will be the number of staked tokens.
